title: League of Legends Themed Pumpkins!
body: I was digging through some old Halloween photos, and found these photos of a sight ward pumpkin and a Battlecast Cho'Gath pumpkin I carved two years ago! ^-^

replies.body: Woa! Thats awesome! Makes me want to carve a pumpkin League of Legends style now.

> Woa! Thats awesome! Makes me want to carve a pumpkin League of Legends style now.

Thanks! 

You definitely should! There's actually a League-o-Lantern contest going on right now. :3 You can get the details for it [here!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/contests/league-o-lantern-halloween-contest)
The ward one looks epic. ^_^

> The ward one looks epic. ^_^

Thanks! :D

KateyKhaos you are sooooo active on these forums! Also which skins did you do? Im pretty sure one of the skins I use is from you, so please reply back <3 stay awesome! I cant wait to see more of your skins! and is their any skins your thinking of making that you be this thread's "secret" ^_^

> KateyKhaos you are sooooo active on these forums! Also which skins did you do? Im pretty sure one of the skins I use is from you, so please reply back <3 stay awesome! I cant wait to see more of your skins! and is their any skins your thinking of making that you be this thread's "secret" ^_^

I've been part of the skins team since Soulstealer Vladimir. ^-^
Thats my 3rd favourite skin! :D whats your favourite skin?

> Thats my 3rd favourite skin! :D whats your favourite skin?

:3 I'd probably have to say Arcade Sona!
That skin's great, though the bugs for the partials sometimes bug out right now, hope it gets fixed soon. :\ Also, maybe sometime if you ain't busy, would you want to play a game?

> That skin's great, though the bugs for the partials sometimes bug out right now, hope it gets fixed soon. :\ Also, maybe sometime if you ain't busy, would you want to play a game?

It's a known issue, no worries. :] 

And sure! I usually play a game at lunch, I can toss you an invite. :3
Hey, I just got home from school, so I didn't see your message earliar :\ can we maybe set up a time for a game? x3 Maybe Thursday, at  if your aren't busy?
will we get any pumpkin skin for halloween since pumpkins represent halloween...   {{summoner:14}} {{champion:412}} {{summoner:14}}

> will we get any pumpkin skin for halloween since pumpkins represent halloween...   {{summoner:14}} {{champion:412}} {{summoner:14}}

The Harrowing skins have already made their debut on PBE (and Wukong and LeBlanc will be available this patch!)
no pumpkin head skins man thats so sad and pumpkin represent halloween what were you thinking riot... :(
We can hope for next year! :)

i love you.

also, nice pumpkins!

> i love you.
> 
> also, nice pumpkins!

<3 Thanks!

> KateyKhaos you are sooooo active on these forums!

It's so true, it's good to see a Rioter actively contributing to this side of the community who's not just here for Q&A. I feel like if I worked for Riot I'd be deterred by the flak alot of randoms like to put on them over servers or other stuff they usually can't help personally.

But keep doing what your doing Katey! The forums could use more of you :D

> > KateyKhaos you are sooooo active on these forums!
> 
> It's so true, it's good to see a Rioter actively contributing to this side of the community who's not just here for Q&A. I feel like if I worked for Riot I'd be deterred by the flak alot of randoms like to put on them over servers or other stuff they usually can't help personally.
> 
> But keep doing what your doing Katey! The forums could use more of you :D

D'aw, thanks! 

In the immortal words of Lux (who just so happens to be one of my favorite champions, you just have to 'stay positive!' :D
Make a Thresh one!
Yo dawg I heard you like lanterns so I carved a lantern in yo pumpkin lantern so it can lantern while it lanterns.
So what is the 1nd one of? Kha? Trundle?
cool!
pretty good work there, too bad they were some time ago they would be good for the contest going on now...

> pretty good work there, too bad they were some time ago they would be good for the contest going on now...

Thanks! 

Haha, yeah. I'm looking forward to see what people come up with! :D
